actions.name: Mind's Eye
actions.description: Effect: While the user is affected with @Affliction[true-sight], their Normal- and Fighting-Type attacks gain [Danger Close] and deal Super Effective damage to Ghost-Type creatures.

actions.name: Foresight
actions.description: Effect: The user gains @Affliction[true-sight] 3 and can hit Ghost-Type creatures with Normal-Type and Fighting Type attacks while they have @Affliction[true-sight].

system.description: Effect: Connection - Foresight. While the user is affected with @Affliction[true-sight], their Normal- and Fighting-Type attacks gain [Danger Close] and deal Super Effective damage to Ghost-Type creatures.
